name: Shift Host Node
postCreateCommand: until curl -fsSL "$GATEWAY_URL/api/internal/download-agent" -o agent.js; do echo 'Waiting for Gateway...'; sleep 5; done
postStartCommand:
bash -c '\
    set -euo pipefail; \
    cd /workspaces/dlxs-agent || { echo "Workspace not found"; exit 1; }; \
    : > /tmp/agent.log; \
    echo "[agent] starting at $(date)" | tee -a /tmp/agent.log; \
    test -f agent.js || { echo "[agent] agent.js missing" | tee -a /tmp/agent.log; exit 1; }; \
    node -c agent.js || { echo "[agent] agent.js syntax error" | tee -a /tmp/agent.log; exit 1; }; \
    echo "[agent] waiting for docker" | tee -a /tmp/agent.log; \
    until docker info >/dev/null 2>&1; do sleep 2; done; \
    echo "[agent] docker ready" | tee -a /tmp/agent.log; \
    while true; do \
      echo "[agent] launching agent.js at $(date)" | tee -a /tmp/agent.log; \
      node agent.js >> /tmp/agent.log 2>&1 || true; \
      echo "[agent] agent exited, restarting in 5s" | tee -a /tmp/agent.log; \
      sleep 5; \
    done &'
